title: Kimi to Aoi Haru no Hajimari
original_name: きみと青い春のはじまり
sinopse:
Shirohara is a very shy and introverted girl. One day she is challenged to confess to the most popular boy in class, a guy named Takasago. Shirohara overcomes her fears and confesses, but the boy does not understand that it is all the result of a challenge and takes it seriously...

(Source: MU, edited)
